@Prince_Buddha_Joe $ATVI is valued at $63B right now. They have a PEG of 1.5 and debt to equity of .5.  They are hardly overvalued to the point there is any room for a lower deal price. $MSFT already has billions tied up in the deal to get it to this point.  The cost to renegotiate would be greater than just the $3B.  $3B is chump change because they don't make mistakes of this magnitude. The margin is not there.  Not anywhere near there.  You can take this one to the bank.
